thePirate:WritingReed.NAME: Writing Reed
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of battle, apply 5 thepirate:Ink to all enemies.

thePirate:Coral.NAME: Coral
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose 1 of 20 cards from the base characters to add to your deck.
Choose a card to put add to your deck.

thePirate:GreedyChest.NAME: Greedy Chest
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of battle, gain 1 strength for every 100 #ygold you have.

thePirate:GunsmithsBible.NAME: Gunsmith's Bible
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click to permanently replace this with a Cannon relic. NL #yCannon #yRelic: At the start of combat, add a Cannon card into your hand. NL Take this relic now, or choose to defer it until a later act and get a more powerful Cannon relic.  Based on the act in which you take this relic, your Cannon card gains (cumulative): NL #yAct #y1:  NL The next Cannonball you play this turn costs 0. NL #yAct #y2: NL The second Cannonball you play this turn costs 0.  NL Apply Vulnerable to target enemy. NL #yAct #y3:  NL Gain 2 Strength. NL #yAct #y4: NL Apply Vulnerable and Weaken to all enemies.  NL All enemies lose two Strength.

thePirate:BronzeCannon.NAME: Bronze Cannon
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add a Cannon to your hand. NL #yCannon #ygains: NL The next Cannonball you play this turn costs 0.

thePirate:SilverCannon.NAME: Silver Cannon
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add a Cannon to your hand. NL #yCannon #ygains: NL The next Cannonball you play this turn costs 0 and is played twice. NL Apply Vulnerable to target enemy.

thePirate:GoldCannon.NAME: Gold Cannon
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add a Cannon to your hand. NL #yCannon #ygains: NL The next Cannonball you play this turn costs 0 and is played twice. NL Apply Vulnerable to target enemy. NL Gain 2 Strength.

thePirate:PlatinumCannon.NAME: Platinum Cannon
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add a Cannon to your hand. NL #yCannon #ygains: NL The next Cannonball you play this turn costs 0 and is played twice. NL Apply Vulnerable and Weaken to all enemies. NL Gain 2 Strength. NL All enemies lose two Strength.

thePirate:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

thePirate:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.
